name: Game of Legends (rgevolved)
description:
The year is 1940 and the name of the game is action. 

Play as either 2 characters and utilize your troops in a WW2 energy game to protect your homeland. Use a unique merge button to bring your troops into a strategic location and venture into enemy territory by yourself or with your team mate to battle paratroopers, dog handlers and the secret police. Play as a elite soldier who lost his family in a horrific AXIS execution, or a man that can who just came out of nowhere. This is an OLD version of the game and this game is available on PLAY store for your mobile devices and tablets from 13th June 2018.

Can you take down the game?
